title: Wheel of Fortune Bonus Puzzle Answer Today for March 3-7, 2025
description: The puzzle solutions for the first week of March 2025. The post Wheel of Fortune Bonus Puzzle Answer Today for March 3-7, 2025 appeared first on ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More.
author: Nicholas Tan
excerpt: Here is the answer to the Wheel of Fortune bonus puzzle today for the first week of March 2025, along with the solutions for the other rounds.
siteName: ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More
text: Below you’ll find the Wheel of Fortune bonus puzzle answer from March 3 to March 7, 2025. We will also provide answers to the rest of the regular puzzles and toss-ups shown throughout the show. This post will be updated every day throughout the week, so please check back on the daily for the latest solutions. The episodes from March 3 to March 7 comprise Island Time Week, so you can expect some of the puzzles to have island themes (like Life’s a Beach as a category). Hosted by Ryan Seacrest and Vanna White, tonight’s game will feature three new contestants: Marisol Gonzalez, Najya Williams, and Jon Usborne. Here are all the solutions to the Wheel of Fortune puzzles for March 6. What are the Wheel of Fortune puzzle answers tonight? The following are the Wheel of Fortune puzzle answers for Thursday, March 6, 2025 and the categories (in brackets) for each puzzle shown in tonight’s episode. Bonus Round Puzzle – WILD BOAR [Living Thing] Tossup #1 – WET SUIT & GOGGLES [What Are You Wearing?] Tossup #2 – LOOK-ALIKE CONTEST [Fun & Games] Regular Puzzle #1 – SUN, SURF & SANDY SHORES [Same Letter] Regular Puzzle #2 – MARDI GRAS PARADE [Event] Regular Puzzle #3 – AS LITTLE AS POSSIBLE [What Are You Doing?] Tossup #3 – BALLPOINT PEN [Thing] Tossup #4 – FOUNTAIN PEN [Thing] Tossup #5 – PIGPEN [Thing] Regular Puzzle #4 – USING MY GRAY MATTER [Colorful Language] Here are the puzzle answer for Wednesday, March 5: Bonus Round Puzzle – KICKING BACK AND RELAXING [What Are You Doing?] Tossup #1 – I’M SO EXCITED [Song TItle] Tossup #2 – SUN HAT & SUNGLASSES [What Are You Wearing?] Regular Puzzle #1 – DRIVING SCHOOL OF MACKEREL [Before & After] Regular Puzzle #2 – AWARD-WINNER DEMI MOORE [Proper Name] Regular Puzzle #3 – BEER PONG CHAMPION [Happy Hour] Tossup #3 – FOLLOWING MY DREAM [What Are You Doing?] Tossup #4 – LIVING THE DREAM [What Are You Doing?] Tossup #5 – DAYDREAMING AT WORK [What Are You Doing?] Regular Puzzle #4 – MOST LIKELY TO SUCCEED [Phrase] Here are the puzzle answer for Tuesday, March 4: Bonus Round Puzzle – GONE HAYWIRE [Phrase] Tossup #1 – PARASAILING [Fun & Games] Tossup #2 – SPRING BREAKERS [People] Regular Puzzle #1 – GNARLY WIPEOUT DUDE! [Life’s A Beach] Regular Puzzle #2 – ODD JOB PROMOTION [Before & After] Regular Puzzle #3 – FROZEN PINA COLADA [Happy Hour] Tossup #3 – ANSWERING MACHINE [Thing] Tossup #4 – A WELL-OILED MACHINE [Thing] Tossup #5 – TIME MACHINE [Thing] Regular Puzzle #4 – FAKE IT TILL YOU MAKE IT [Rhyme Time] Here are the puzzle answers for Monday, March 3: Bonus Round Puzzle – ZIP-UP HOODIE [What Are You Wearing?] Tossup #1 – CHECKING SURF CONDITIONS [What Are You Doing?] Tossup #2 – GREAT POTENTIAL [Thing] Regular Puzzle #1 – OCEAN BREEZE & COCONUT TREES [Rhyme Time] Regular Puzzle #2 – PINEAPPLE EXPRESS YOURSELF [Before & After] Regular Puzzle #3 – FLIP-FLOP KIND OF DAY [Life’s A Beach] Tossup #3 – BUS STATION [Place] Tossup #4 – GAS STATION [Place] Tossup #5 – OMELET STATION [Place] Regular Puzzle #4 – SAND IN MY SWIMSUIT [Pet Peeve] The Fan Friday contest by Collette is still active and a new word for the sweepstakes will be posted at some time during the March 7 episode.
html:
Below you’ll find the Wheel of Fortune bonus puzzle answer from March 3 to March 7, 2025. We will also provide answers to the rest of the regular puzzles and toss-ups shown throughout the show. This post will be updated every day throughout the week, so please check back on the daily for the latest solutions.

The episodes from March 3 to March 7 comprise Island Time Week, so you can expect some of the puzzles to have island themes (like Life’s a Beach as a category). Hosted by Ryan Seacrest and Vanna White, tonight’s game will feature three new contestants: Marisol Gonzalez, Najya Williams, and Jon Usborne. Here are all the solutions to the Wheel of Fortune puzzles for March 6.

What are the Wheel of Fortune puzzle answers tonight?

The following are the Wheel of Fortune puzzle answers for Thursday, March 6, 2025 and the categories (in brackets) for each puzzle shown in tonight’s episode.

  • Bonus Round Puzzle – WILD BOAR [Living Thing]
  • Tossup #1 – WET SUIT & GOGGLES [What Are You Wearing?]
  • Tossup #2 – LOOK-ALIKE CONTEST [Fun & Games]
  • Regular Puzzle #1 – SUN, SURF & SANDY SHORES [Same Letter]
  • Regular Puzzle #2 – MARDI GRAS PARADE [Event]
  • Regular Puzzle #3 – AS LITTLE AS POSSIBLE [What Are You Doing?]
  • Tossup #3 – BALLPOINT PEN [Thing]
  • Tossup #4 – FOUNTAIN PEN [Thing]
  • Tossup #5 – PIGPEN [Thing]
  • Regular Puzzle #4 – USING MY GRAY MATTER [Colorful Language]

Here are the puzzle answer for Wednesday, March 5:

  • Bonus Round Puzzle – KICKING BACK AND RELAXING [What Are You Doing?]
  • Tossup #1 – I’M SO EXCITED [Song TItle]
  • Tossup #2 – SUN HAT & SUNGLASSES [What Are You Wearing?]
  • Regular Puzzle #1 – DRIVING SCHOOL OF MACKEREL [Before & After]
  • Regular Puzzle #2 – AWARD-WINNER DEMI MOORE [Proper Name]
  • Regular Puzzle #3 – BEER PONG CHAMPION [Happy Hour]
  • Tossup #3 – FOLLOWING MY DREAM [What Are You Doing?]
  • Tossup #4 – LIVING THE DREAM [What Are You Doing?]
  • Tossup #5 – DAYDREAMING AT WORK [What Are You Doing?]
  • Regular Puzzle #4 – MOST LIKELY TO SUCCEED [Phrase]

Here are the puzzle answer for Tuesday, March 4:

  • Bonus Round Puzzle – GONE HAYWIRE [Phrase]
  • Tossup #1 – PARASAILING [Fun & Games]
  • Tossup #2 – SPRING BREAKERS [People]
  • Regular Puzzle #1 – GNARLY WIPEOUT DUDE! [Life’s A Beach]
  • Regular Puzzle #2 – ODD JOB PROMOTION [Before & After]
  • Regular Puzzle #3 – FROZEN PINA COLADA [Happy Hour]
  • Tossup #3 – ANSWERING MACHINE [Thing]
  • Tossup #4 – A WELL-OILED MACHINE [Thing]
  • Tossup #5 – TIME MACHINE [Thing]
  • Regular Puzzle #4 – FAKE IT TILL YOU MAKE IT [Rhyme Time]

Here are the puzzle answers for Monday, March 3:

  • Bonus Round Puzzle – ZIP-UP HOODIE [What Are You Wearing?]
  • Tossup #1 – CHECKING SURF CONDITIONS [What Are You Doing?]
  • Tossup #2 – GREAT POTENTIAL [Thing]
  • Regular Puzzle #1 – OCEAN BREEZE & COCONUT TREES [Rhyme Time]
  • Regular Puzzle #2 – PINEAPPLE EXPRESS YOURSELF [Before & After]
  • Regular Puzzle #3 – FLIP-FLOP KIND OF DAY [Life’s A Beach]
  • Tossup #3 – BUS STATION [Place]
  • Tossup #4 – GAS STATION [Place]
  • Tossup #5 – OMELET STATION [Place]
  • Regular Puzzle #4 – SAND IN MY SWIMSUIT [Pet Peeve]

The Fan Friday contest by Collette is still active and a new word for the sweepstakes will be posted at some time during the March 7 episode.
